name: Magic Shop (itch)
description:
A small playable demo of a stylized magic shop environment. Created over the span of 7 weeks, all assets within the shop including the character and animations were created by me.  Modeled in Blender, textured in Substance Painter and Designer, built in Unity.

External assets acquired from the Unity Asset Store:

Medieval Windmill by Polygrade

Medieval Town Exteriors by Lylek Games

Audio by WPI student Devin Patel
